t: Amazon.com: Amazon Autos FAQs: Amazon Autos
s: Amazon Autos is a partnership between participating local Hyundai dealerships and Amazon that allows you to browse and purchase or lease a car from a dealership through Amazon.com. Vehicles listed at Amazon Autos are sold or leased by participating local dealerships, not by Amazon.

t: Starting Today You Can Buy a Car on Amazon in These 6 Cities - Newsweek
s: January 7, 2025 - The Korean Hyundai brand now has several vehicles available to 'Add to Cart' on the Amazon's website

t: Amazon starts selling Hyundai cars, more brands next year - Ars Technica
s: December 10, 2024 - But now, with Amazon Autos, customers can go ahead and buy the car, not just learn about it so they can go to a dealer well-informed. In fact, the dealerships remain part of the process even with Amazon Autos—hence the fact that the service is not rolling out nationwide.

t: You Can Buy a Car on Amazon Now
s: December 10, 2024 - Assuming you want a new Hyundai specifically, you can now buy the car on Amazon. The online retailer has launched its long-awaited automotive service called Amazon Autos. Amazon announced the service in late 2023, saying it would come sometime in 2024.

t: Hyundai Motor: First auto brand available for purchase on Amazon Autos - KED Global
s: January 8, 2025 - Hyundai animates an Amazon fulfillment center to promote car-buying on Amazon Hyundai Motor is the first and only car brand to enable direct vehicle purchases through Amazon Autos. This allows US customers to browse, order and finance new Hyundai cars online.

t: r/technology on Reddit: Amazon starts selling Hyundai cars, more brands next year | Amazon Autos has gone live in 48 US cities
s: December 11, 2024 - I won’t lie Hyundai’s Ioniq ... two brands are dead to me because of the Tiktok trend. At this point I know several people who have had their Kia/Hyundai stolen or broken into over the past couple years. Definitely never getting anything from these two for as long as I need a car basically just because of that. I had to drive around with a steering wheel lock for months until Kia patched their cars. ... My understanding is amazon is just serving ...
